law.catch_line: The following political subdivisions may apply to the Secretary to designate an enterprise zone:...

text.section:
The following political subdivisions may apply to the Secretary to designate an enterprise zone:
a political subdivision for an area within that political subdivision;
with the prior consent of the municipal corporation, a county on behalf of a municipal corporation for an area in the municipal corporation; or
two or more political subdivisions jointly for an area astride their common boundaries.
